question: Which state has launched the door delivery programme for supply of ration to general public?
explanation:
The Government of Andhra Pradesh headed by Y.S. Jagan Mohan Reddy has launched the door delivery programme for ration, wherein 9,260 “Mobile Dispensing Units” / vehicles will supply ration (rice and other essential commodities) at the door steps of ration cardholders in the State.
This move aims to eliminate adulteration of food commodities and also prevent formation of long queues at the fair price shops.
